thread.title: BRIEF-Zendesk Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.28

title: BRIEF-Zendesk Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.28
text:
BRIEF-Zendesk Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.28 Reuters Staff * ZENDESK ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS
* Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.02 * Q1 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.28
* Q1 REVENUE $129.8 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $126.4 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.03 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES Q2 2018 REVENUE $136 MILLION TO $138 MILLION
* SEES FULL YEAR 2018 FREE CASH FLOW IN RANGE OF $25.0 - 30.0 MILLION
* SEES FULL YEAR 2018 GAAP OPERATING LOSS IN RANGE OF $132.0 - $127.0 MILLION
* SEES FULL YEAR 2018 NON-GAAP OPERATING INCOME IN RANGE OF $0.0 - 5.0 MILLION
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $562.7 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q2 REVENUE VIEW $133.8 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
